name: Block Ultimate Puzzle
description:
Block Ultimate is an easy and fun puzzle game.


FEATURES
● 8 difficulty, offers more than 5000 puzzles.
● Really easy and simple operation
● Cute and clean design, easy to see color.
● Supports all Android devices.
● Supports all resolutions.
● Supports leaderboards and achievements.
● You will receive bonus gold blocks for each of the five stages. Watch the + sign on the gift box.


Developer Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ordinarycell
